Yomiwa

The Yomiwa project started in February 2013, with the aim of building one of the very first Japanese optical recognition app. The Yomiwa app has since been updated continuously over the years to become the most advanced Japanese dictionary, translator and optical recognizer on the Apple Store and Google Play Stores.
